backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Help me understand where I am spending my time and identify ways I can reclaim time to focus more on my top priorities.

gutts.name: Calendar Historical Data Retrieval
gutts.capability: Load past calendar events for specified time period
gutts.evidence: Retrieved 3 months of calendar history (July-September) with 267 events

gutts.name: Meeting Categorization & Classification
gutts.capability: Classify meetings by type, purpose, importance, participants
gutts.user_goal: Understand what kinds of meetings fill the calendar
gutts.evidence: Classified meetings into: Team Sync (45), 1:1 (38), Planning (22), Customer (15), etc.

gutts.name: Time Aggregation & Statistical Analysis
gutts.capability: Compute time spent per category, participant, project, etc.
gutts.user_goal: Quantify where time is actually going
gutts.evidence: Analysis: 45% team meetings, 25% 1:1s, 15% planning, 10% customers, 5% other

gutts.name: Priority Alignment Assessment
gutts.capability: Evaluate which time usage aligns with stated priorities
gutts.user_goal: See misalignment between goals and actual time usage
gutts.evidence: Priority #1 (Product Launch): 30% time vs 50% desired → 20% gap identified

gutts.name: Low-Value Meeting Identification
gutts.capability: Flag meetings that consume time without supporting priorities
gutts.user_goal: Know which meetings to eliminate or delegate
gutts.evidence: Identified 12 low-value meetings: 8 status syncs (informational only), 4 overlapping topics

gutts.name: Time Reclamation Opportunity Analysis
gutts.capability: Calculate potential time savings from proposed changes
gutts.user_goal: Understand how much time could be reclaimed
gutts.evidence: Potential reclamation: 6 hours/week by eliminating 8 meetings, delegating 4

gutts.name: Schedule Optimization Recommendations
gutts.capability: Suggest specific changes (decline, delegate, shorten, consolidate)
gutts.user_goal: Know exactly what to do to reclaim time
gutts.evidence: Recommendations: (1) Decline weekly status sync, (2) Delegate 4 operational meetings, (3) Shorten 3 meetings from 60→30min

gutts.name: Time Usage Reporting & Visualization
gutts.capability: Present insights with charts, summaries, comparisons
gutts.user_goal: Easily understand patterns and take action
gutts.evidence: Generated time usage dashboard with pie charts, trend lines, priority alignment heatmap

notes: Generated by GPT-5 - Matches reference decomposition of 8 GUTTs
